MADANARATNAPRADĪPA

(VYAVAHĀRAVIVEKODDYOTA)

UNDER THE PATRONAGE OF KING MADANASIṀHA

**MAHĀMAHOPĀDHYĀYA **

Dr. P. V. KANE, M. A. LL. M,
